text: General Mills Inc. is an American corporation, focused on food products. The company's headquarters are in Golden Valley, Minnesota. It markets many well- known North American brands. Its most well-known products are cereals, such as Cheerios, Trix, and Lucky Charms. The company makes more than 100 of the leading U.S. brands."Nourishing Lives". General Mills. ==References== Category:1866 establishments in the United States Category:American food companies Category:Companies based in Minnesota
title: General Mills
